data.name: RunnerDot
data.detailed_description:
Android version

Android version, available on the Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sk.smdtech.sliderman


iOS version

iOS version, available on the Apple App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/runnerdot-mobile/id1572993093


About the Game

In RunnerDot, you play as the Dot, the game's protagonist. Your life's goal is to collect Crates while at the same time, evade enemies that are constantly on your tail, trying to destroy you. These enemies come in a couple of flavors, the Particle and the Barrier being the most common ones.

By collecting Crates, your score goes up. The higher your score, the cooler you look. In addition, your score goes into a global Steam leaderboard in which you compete with all the other players. You also collect achievements.

There's also a mobile version of this game, available for Android and iOS. It follows the same logic. It's currently available directly in the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

There's also a mobile version of this game, available for Android and iOS. It follows the same logic. It's currently available directly in the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.
data.short_description: RunnerDot is a casual little game made to kill your time. Seriously. When you're feeling like doing nothing, fire up RunnerDot and enjoy! You play as a little dot, and you use your mouse to navigate. You avoid stuff coming at you, and you collect points. Survive the longest. Compete in leaderboards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is pretty lightweight, so chill out.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is pretty lightweight, so chill out.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any Debian-based distro, altough should work on any distro
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is pretty lightweight, so chill out. Wine should have no problem running it.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any Debian-based distro, altough should work on any distro
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is pretty lightweight, so chill out. Wine should have no problem running it.

data.name: Battlefield 1 Shortcut Kit: Vehicle Bundle
data.detailed_description:
It’s the dawn of all-out war, so you’d better go in armed. The Vehicle Bundle immediately unlocks all vehicle packages and primary weapons earned for Pilot and Tanker classes in Battlefield™ 1 multiplayer.


Only base game progression items included. This Shortcut Kit does not contain items offered in future downloadable content, items added in expansion packs, content that must be unlocked through Battlepacks, or promotional offer items.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor (AMD): AMD FX-6350 Processor (Intel): Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card (AMD): AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 2GB Graphics card (NVIDIA): NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

  • Processor: Processor (AMD): AMD FX 8350 Wraith Processor (Intel): Intel Core i7 4790 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card (AMD): AMD Radeon™ RX 480 4GB Graphics card (NVIDIA): NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 3GB

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
